item.title: About
item.description: I am a passionate software engineer. As a hobby I am maintaining my ada pool. I try to be an example in saving our planet and pushing climate neutrality, by living vegetarian, reducing Co2 footprint, supporting the right projects and adding awareness to the people I get in touch with. The first step is getting aware and changing your own habits.

item.title: Mission
item.description: By running our pool on 100% solar power and on bare-metal on premise servers, we are providing our delegators a chance to earn rewards and support our planet at once. With your delegation, you support climate change! Support us, make a difference, drive climate change, help to change society for the better by adding awareness and doing the next step in the right direction. We donate 10% of our profits to seaspiracy.

item.title: Setup
item.description: 100% renewable solar power from our photovoltaic system on the roof, including a 7-kWh battery in the basement. The pool exits of 4 raspberry pi; two relays, one block producer and one monitoring device. Green energy and low power consumtion.
